channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows 8.1 and Windows RT 8.1, and Windows Server 2012 R2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows 8.1 and Windows RT 8.1, and Windows Server 2012 R2

item.title: CVE-2017-8594|2024-09-17T01:26:16.116Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- windows%208.1%20and%20windows%20rt%208.1%2C%20and%20windows%20server%202012%20r2
item.description: Internet Explorer on Microsoft Windows 8.1 and Windows RT 8.1, and Windows Server 2012 R2 allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user when Internet Explorer improperly accesses objects in memory, aka "Internet Explorer Memory Corruption Vulnerability".
